result.arabic_text: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَحۡشُرَنَّهُمۡ وَٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ ثُمَّ لَنُحۡضِرَنَّهُمۡ حَوۡلَ جَهَنَّمَ جِثِيّٗا
result.translation: 68. Ee Rabbigaa baan ku dhaartaye, waanu soo kulmin iyaga iyo shaydaammadaba, markaas waxaanu keeni hareeraha jahannama iyagoo jilba joogsan11.
result.footnotes: 11. Iyagoo kuf kufaya oo jilbahooda u dhacaya argagax darteed ama loo jiidayo Naarta iyagoo aan dooneyn oo jilbaha ku jooga oo dhulka ku jiidaya.
